secret_rule: Only items that are associated with a famous event in history can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "moon rock" and "Boston Tea Party tea".
Can I bring an "Apollo 11 astronaut suit"?
Yes, you can bring an Apollo 11 astronaut suit.
Player: Can I bring a "Declaration of Independence parchment"?
Yes, you can bring a Declaration of Independence parchment.
Player: Can I bring a "dinosaur fossil"?
No, you cannot bring a dinosaur fossil.
Player: Can I bring a "moon landing flag"?
Yes, you can bring a moon landing flag.
Player: Can I bring the "Liberty Bell"?
Yes, you can bring the Liberty Bell.
The rule seems to be that you can only bring items that are historically significant or related to significant events in American history.
